T04bsa035_u:5: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
T04bsa035_u:7: ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
T04bsa035_u:13: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
T04bsa035_u:18: tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
T04bsa035_u:21: triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
T04bsa035_u:22: kṛtāñjaliḥ daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet /
T04bsa035_u:24: tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya,
T04bsa035_u:27: aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet /
T04bsa035_u:28: ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante, (tān)
T04bsa035_u:31: yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet /
T04bsa035_u:32: tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet /
T04bsa035_u:34: yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt /
T04bsa035_u:42: tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge avasthānāya pratijānīyāt /
T04bsa035_u:53: tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt /
T04bsa035_u:54: tataḥ bhojanāvasare- 'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na puṣṭyartha,
T04bsa035_u:67: tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam /
T04bsa035_u:68: madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ /
T04bsa035_u:75: evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti /
T04bsa035_u:79: śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ /
T04bsa035_u:80: gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya // 4 //
T04bsa035_u:84: tenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā ca jayaśīlena anūditā //
